comment: Howd this turn out?  Im considering doing this myself.

I was really happy with the result. The peppers added a nice flavor with minimal heat. I expected more chocolate from the nibs. Not sure how to tweak it to get more chocolate...  I soaked the nibs in bourbon then added the bourbon and nibs to secondary with the peppers.  I made a tea with the dried pepper (steeped 10 min) then added tea and peppers to secondary.  Good luck!
